name: vue-cli-template
description: A vue-cli template who plants the first seed of your project in order to become a sturdy and flowering tree

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:pierrechls/seed gh-pages --force
